66698.錬金の依頼を 中止すると\n<%sL_RECIPE>の錬金は 成功しません。\n:
By cancelling the alchemy request, the
<%sL_RECIPE> alchemy will fail.
Are you sure you want to cancel it?
<yesno 2><break>

66699.錬金の依頼を 中止すると\n<%sL_RECIPE>の成功効果は付きません。\n:
By cancelling the alchemy request, the
<%sL_RECIPE> alchemy effect will not
be attached. Are you sure you want to cancel?
<yesno 2><break>

66702.錬金の依頼の内容が 決まりました。\n<%sL_PC>に <%sL_SYOKUN:
The details of your alchemy request have been
confirmed. Submit a <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>
request to <%sL_PC>?
<yesno><break>

66704.<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>の依頼を 受けるには\n<%sL_TOOL:
To accept the <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE> request,
a <%sL_TOOL_NAME><%sL_QUALITY> is required.

66705.<%sL_SKILL_NAME>設備が 遠すぎます。: The facility is too far away.

66707.職人仕事のお礼が 持ちきれません。:
I cannot thank you enough for your
craftsmanship.

66710.<%sL_PC>は\n<%sL_SKILL_NAME>のレシピを 覚えていないの:
<%sL_PC> does not know this recipe,
so you cannot submit a request for
<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>.

66711.<%sL_PC>に 使ってもらう\n<%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME>を:
You do not have a <%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME> for
<%sL_PC> to use.

66712.<%sL_PC>が 近くにいないので\n<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>の:
You cannot submit a request for
<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE> because <%sL_PC> is not
nearby.

66713.<%sL_PC>は\n<%sL_SKILL_NAME>設備の 近くにいないので\:
<%sL_PC> is not near a <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>
facility, so you cannot submit a request
for <%sL_SKILL_NAME>.

66714.<speed=0>\n「錬金の依頼」の 説明です！\n<br>\nツボ錬金職人か:
This will explain "Alchemy Requests"!
You can request a Pot or Lamp Alchemist to add alchemy effects to your equipment.
The request will succeed once you choose what you want, and the other player accepts. You can request items you have equipped.
The requestor must provide all necessary materials and crafting tools, as well as the equipment.
As always, please remember that alchemy is a very risky procedure. You may end up with bad or unwanted effects.

66715.錬金の依頼を中止したため 錬金が失敗しました。:
The request was cancelled, so the alchemy was
not successful.

66717.<%sL_PC>に <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>の依頼を 申し込みまし:
You have submitted a request for <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE> to <%sL_PC>. Cannot move while <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE> request is in
progress. You can cancel with

67346.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>には\nこれ以上 錬金効果を付けら:
No more alchemical effects can be added to
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>.
<end>

67348.<%sL_PC>は\n<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>に付けられる:
<%sL_PC> does not know the
<%sL_SKILL_NAME> recipe attached to
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>.
<end>

67349.<%sL_RECIPE>を付けるには\n<%sL_PC>の <%sL_SYOKU:
<%sL_RECIPE> requires <%sL_SYOKUNIN_KIND>
artisan level of <%dL_NECESSARY_LV> or higher
for <%sL_PC>.
<end>

67350.<%sL_RECIPE>を付けるには\n素材が 足りません。\n<end>:
There is not enough material to add
<%sL_RECIPE>.
<end>

67351.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>には\nできのよさの <color:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> does not have
a quality of <color_yellow><color_white>, so
alchemy effects cannot be added to it.
<end>

67352.錬金の依頼で使用する\n<%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME>を選んでください:
Please select the <%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME> to be
used for the alchemy request.
<break>

67353.職人仕事のお礼として <%sL_PC>に渡す\nゴールドを 設定してください。\:
Set the amount of gold to give to <%sL_PC> as a thank you for their craftsmanship. This is what you pay them regardless of the result of
the alchemy.

67354.どの装備品に 錬金効果を付けますか？<break>:
Which item would you like to add alchemy
effects to?<break>

67355.<%sL_PC>は <%sL_SKILL_NAME>職人レベル<%dL_SYOK:
<%sL_PC> is a level <%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV> <%sL_SKILL_NAME>.
Choose the alchemy effect you'd like to add to
the <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>.<break>

67522.錬金効果を付けられる装備品を持っていないので\n<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TY:
I cannot apply for <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE> because
I do not have any equipment to which
alchemical effects can be applied.

68510.すでに錬金ルーレットが 回っているので\n錬金の依頼を 中止することはできません:
The alchemy roulette is already running, so
the alchemy request cannot be canceled.

68838.しかし <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TOOL>のおかげで\n<%sL_ITEM>:

<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> had no effect and lost
no material!<bw_break>

68839.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>が\n<%sL_RECIPE>の効:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> will be filled with
the effect of <%sL_RECIPE>!
<bw_break>

68841.パルプンテが 起こった！\nふしぎなチカラが 集まってくる……！<bw_brea:
Hocus Pocus happened! Mysterious power
gathers...!<bw_break>

179507.<%sL_PC>は\n今週の職人回数が 上限に達したので\nこれ以上 錬金はでき:
You have reached the limit of the number of times you can perform alchemy per week, so you cannot do so at this time.
This limit resets each week on Sunday at 6:00 AM JST.
